title: Lust Stories 2
director: R. Balki, Sujoy Ghosh, Amit Ravindernath Sharma
writer: Sujoy Ghosh, R. Balki, Konkona Sen Sharma, Pooja Tolani, Saurabh Choudhary, Rishi Virmani, Amit Ravindernath Sharma
short_cast: Kajol, Mrunal Thakur, Neena Gupta, Tamannaah Bhatia, Vijay Varma, Amruta Subhash, Tillotama Shome, Kumud Mishra, Angad Bedi
cast: Kajol, Mrunal Thakur, Neena Gupta, Tamannaah Bhatia, Vijay Varma, Amruta Subhash, Tillotama Shome, Kumud Mishra, Angad Bedi
genre: Anthology Films, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Romantic Comedies, Dramas, Comedy Movies, Romantic Movies
desc: Four eminent Indian directors explore sex, desire and love through short films in this sequel to 2018's Emmy-nominated "Lust Stories."
